Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Analysis is reported on 37 patients with a minimum of 6 months follow - up who received a total of 192 cycles of TFL : nine cycles ( 5 % ) were associated with grade 3 / 4 neutropenia requiring hospitalization ; seven ( 4 % ) cycles in two patients required granulocyte colony - stimulating factor due to neutropenia ; no patient required platelet transfusions .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Neutropenia |

In the given paragraph, the only mentioned disease entities are "neutropenia" which is explicitly stated multiple times. Therefore, the table above presents this disease entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Neutropenia |

In the given paragraph, only the term "neutropenia" clearly refers to a disease. Therefore, the table above presents this disease entity. Other terms like "follow up," "hospitalization," and "granulocyte colony-stimulating factor" do not directly refer to diseases but rather describe certain aspects of the disease course or treatment.
